official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act with respect to disaster loan programs.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to specify the maximum interest rate on disaster loans made by the Small Business Administration (SBA) to homeowners or small businesses for disasters commencing on or after April 1, 1983. Prohibits the SBA from imposing a cap of less than $100,000 for real property and less than $25,000 for personal property on loans made to individuals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act with respect to disaster loan programs.
